ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 92
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It seems to me that it depends greatly on your experience level.  At level 27 I was only able to raise tinkering to 60.  The skill does not take dozens and
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Sean Dorsey" <sdorsey@...>
>
>I made 8 Cams in a row with out anything.. not counting the two lockpicks
>and about 40 - 50 lanterns. Told a guide I was bugged, told me to stop
>bugging him.. sigh...


It seems to me that it depends greatly on your experience level. At level
27 I was only able to raise tinkering to 60. The skill does not take dozens
and dozens of attempts to raise. If it doesn't go up after 20, it isn't
going up til you level. So far, it seems that you can only learn one point
per level til 28, then 5 points per level after that. I am level 30 now,
and I will try to get past 75 to see if one can gain more than 5 points per
level.

Phenglei -- Erollisi Marr
